name: Catan
short_description: A strategy game where players collect and trade resources to build settlements, roads, and cities to reach 10 victory points.

name: Ticket to Ride
short_description: A family-friendly game where players collect train cards to claim railway routes and connect cities across a map.

name: Pandemic
short_description: A cooperative game where players work together to stop the spread of diseases and find cures before time runs out.

name: Carcassonne
short_description: A tile-placement game where players create a medieval landscape and score points by completing cities, roads, and fields.

name: 7 Wonders
short_description: A civilization-building game where players draft cards to develop their cities and build wonders over three ages.

name: Codenames
short_description: A word-based party game where two teams compete to find their hidden agents using one-word clues.

name: Gloomhaven
short_description: A cooperative dungeon-crawling game where players explore dungeons and complete quests in a fantasy world.

name: Dixit
short_description: A storytelling game where players use abstract cards to give clues and guess which card matches the storyteller's clue.

name: Azul
short_description: A tile-drafting game where players select colorful tiles to create beautiful patterns and score points.

name: Wingspan
short_description: An engine-building game where players attract birds to their wildlife reserves and score points through food, eggs, and bird powers.
